name: links-folder
title: Links Folder
description: Browse link folders and open all links at once, like a browser favorites bar.
author: Francescoparadiso

commands.name: explore
commands.title: Explore Links
commands.description: Navigate and manage your saved links and folders.

commands.name: export-links
commands.title: Export Links
commands.description: Exports your saved links as a JSON file to your Downloads folder.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
